alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 3:58AM EST until January 11 at 1:40PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following creeks in Pennsylvania... Swatara Creek near Hershey affecting Dauphin and Lebanon Counties. Conodoguinet Creek near Hogestown affecting Cumberland County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Swatara Creek above Middletown affecting Dauphin County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following creeks in Pennsylvania... Yellow Breeches Creek near Camp Hill affecting York and Cumberland Counties. Swatara Creek at Harper Tavern affecting Schuylkill and Lebanon Counties. For the Conodoguinet Creek...including Hogestown...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Swatara Creek...including Middletown and Hershey...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Swatara Creek near Hershey. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, The right, or north bank begins to overflow. Several roadways upstream of the gage are affected by high water. At 8.0 feet, The right, or north bank overflows. Several roads are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 AM EST Thursday was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The creek is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to less than 5.0 feet by early Friday. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
